mapper.select: SELECT seq, category_id, challenge_gubun, challenge_title, start_mon, end_mon, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, ins_user, upt_dttm, upt_user FROM t_challenge WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_challenge (category_id, challenge_gubun, challenge_title, start_mon, end_mon, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, ins_user) VALUES (#{category_id}, #{challenge_gubun}, #{challenge_title}, #{start_mon}, #{end_mon}, #{chk_at}, #{del_at}, now(), #{ins_user})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_challenge SET category_id = #{categoryId}, challenge_gubun = #{challengeGubun}, challenge_title = #{challengeTitle}, start_mon = #{startMon}, end_mon = #{endMon}, chk_at = #{chkAt}, del_at = #{delAt}, upt_dttm = now(), upt_user = #{uptUser} WHERE seq = #{seq}
